data.title: Forbes on LinkedIn: Power Duo: How Savannah Guthrie And Hoda Kotb Prove That 'It Gets Greater,…
data.meta_description: Savannah Guthrie and Hoda Kotb made TODAY Show history by becoming the first all-female anchor team in 70 years. Each morning, they demonstrate how women can…
data.text:
Colleges Comply With Anti-DEI Mandates With Firings…And Finesse Public universities in red states have seen the biggest changes, but even private colleges in blue states need to worry about legal challenges–to targeted scholarships and other programs. Read more: https://lnkd.in/e6kpupyD

The San Francisco World Spirits Competition named Heaven Hill out of Bardstown, Kentucky, the most awarded U.S. whiskey maker of the year. The legendary producer of bourbon and rye took home a total of 29 medals across 13 of its marquee labels. That’s enough to make it not only the most lauded whiskey maker, but the most successful American distillery, full stop, among all categories of spirit. Read more: https://trib.al/yFvO3Jd

When Donald Trump took office in 2017, he refused to divest his businesses, bringing overseas entanglements with him into the White House. From an ethical perspective, it was a disaster. From a financial perspective, however, it made some sense—here's why: https://trib.al/VCzlv1Z

Fresh off the heels of the U.S. Women's Basketball team's gold medal triumph at the Paris Olympics, where New York Liberty stars Breanna Stewart and Sabrina Ionescu played pivotal roles, the WNBA is riding a wave of unprecedented attention. At the heart of this surge is the New York Liberty, one of the league's original franchises, now poised for a renaissance under the leadership of CEO Keia Clarke. In the heart of Brooklyn, Clarke is orchestrating a transformation that extends far beyond the basketball court, embodying a fundamental shift in how women's sports are valued and supported.

Mike Lynch, a British tech entrepreneur who once ranked on the Forbes billionaire list, is reportedly missing alongside five others after a yacht sank off the coast of Sicily. Read more: https://lnkd.in/e8xVBp-b

In an election year, money flows fast. Since Forbes first looked at Trump’s top billionaire backers two months ago, things have shifted. Take a look at our updated breakdown: https://trib.al/AqGChpW

The IRS has issued guidance for a new opportunity for taxpayers created under SECURE 2.0 that allows employers to make matching contributions to retirement plans based on employees' student loan payments. The match amount is calculated as if the employee contributed their loan amount to the plan even if they did not make any elective contributions.

Since it was released in April, Taylor Swift’s The Tortured Poets Department has been a true sales juggernaut. The set has ranked among the top-selling titles in the country for months, and it still manages to move huge sums every week. The Tortured Poets Department sold another 84,000 copies last week in America, according to Luminate. That’s the kind of number that most artists can only hope for when they drop an exciting, heavily-promoted new full-length. Read more: https://trib.al/heKKs4m
